backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with data models for books, meditation sessions, journal entries, user profiles, rituals, and progress tracking, plus static book data.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing feature IDs, descriptions, affected files, components, and test IDs for UI modifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend files describing their roles, behaviors, and recent updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook with step-by-step instructions for redeploying the app using DFX and pnpm.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures across install, backend, build, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point with environment shims, global error handlers, and the root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, error boundary, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for choosing ambient sound options with swipe/arrow navigation and audio playback with mute and volume control.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a detailed error screen with message, stack trace, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner showing cloud sync/load failures with a retry button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation bar with animated icons that navigate to journal, progress, books, and knowledge pages.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide‑out menu providing theme toggle, account controls, navigation actions, and logout behavior integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paged book-like viewer supporting swipe, keyboard navigation, and automatic scrolling between text pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe and key navigation and animated center-focused item display.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: A dialog-based quiz component that shuffles questions, tracks answers and navigation, and displays results with score reporting.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: R3F lotus model that animates petals, stem, and glow based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: R3F particle system orbiting or drifting around the lotus depending on growth state coherence.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas animation rendering lotus petals and particles with theme- and variant-based visibility adjustments and breathing effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Swipeable and button-controlled carousel showing meditation types with centered scaling and visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: A step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, dot indicators, and parsed content including optional benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based animated timer ring that visualizes progress with themed colors, wave effects, and a glowing edge.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component rendering an animated circular water-fill indicator with easing based on progress and theme colors.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only button that navigates back to the dashboard when visible.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper providing a full-page background with a LotusCanvas effect and optional variants.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl graphic that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus visualization showing growth state with lighting, particles, and auto-rotating controls.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus visualization with animated breathing, glow, and layer openness derived from growth state and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog capturing user answers and computing a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Dialog listing up to five saved rituals with options to start or delete via a carousel interface.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel for navigating, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe and dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login state and provides navigation and logout actions, clearing related queries on logout.
Navigation bar offering theme toggle, back buttons, session indicator, and mobile menu integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and handling login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Provides a meditation timer hook with pause, seek, progress tracking, and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for meditation types, daily quotes, and guest data with mock fallbacks and local storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and animation utilities for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports an extended book type and a static list of recommended meditation-related books with Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Contains structured educational content for meditation techniques, including pages and quiz questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Implements a swipeable, theme-aware carousel UI for browsing meditation book recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with quotes, rituals, quiz flow, theme toggle, and navigation into pre‑meditation sessions. Manages ritual actions, quote selection, and UI modals.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides a searchable, filterable journal with editing, deleting, favoriting, import/export, and cloud‑synced entry mutations. Handles inline editing and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Displays meditation knowledge content with category navigation, scroll handling, and quiz scoring tied to user identity. Loads and persists quiz results per technique.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the public landing screen with theme toggle, animated background, and login or guest navigation. Redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Configures a meditation session with timers, mood/energy inputs, music selection, guides, and journal/ritual creation. Manages session state and navigation into the meditation flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Renders the progress page showing stats, rank, and a bowl visualization, with import/export handlers and cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the stats page.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides cloud sync error mappings, helper functions to derive user-friendly messages, and readiness checks for actor and identity.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Defines export/import JSON formats and functions to serialize backend data and validate/deserialize imported files.
Manages quiz score storage per principal ID with localStorage and exposes a hook for reading and saving scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visualization parameters based on total meditation minutes using phased thresholds and smooth interpolation.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Handles guest-only localStorage for journal entries, progress data, and rituals, including legacy migration and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers for meditation minutes and provides helpers to determine current rank, next rank, and minutes until rank up.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and sync or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config extending colors, container settings, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including feature requirements for compacting and centering meditation UI controls.
